item.title: 10 Ways to Boost Your Memory
item.description: Your risk of developing dementia increases with age. Discover simple yet effective strategies to boost cognitive function and keep your brain sharp.

item.title: Employers added only 12,000 jobs in October. That seems bad -- but there's a catch
item.description: U.S. employers added just 12,000 jobs last month — but the number was depressed by a machinists' strike at Boeing and Hurricanes Helene and Milton.

item.title: Some States Are Turning Miscarriages and Stillbirths Into Criminal Cases Against Women
item.description: How a person handles a pregnancy loss — and where it occurs — can be the difference between a private medical issue and facing criminal charges.

item.description: Along with immense human suffering, deporting millions of people could cost billions and damage the economy, according to several recent analyses.
